data.text: @EU_Commission @GabrielMariya @DSMeu @NatBruxelles We will all see you in court. You represent the Fourth Reich under est. You will all be punished for high treason. #EnemiesOfThePeople #tribunal

@EU_Commission @GabrielMariya @Ansip_EU @TimmermansEU @DSMeu @NatBruxelles Is someone preventing EU citizens from accessing reliable information? Because that doesn't seem to be an actual problem -- unless you really mean "right not to access unreliable information", which sounds somewhat nonsensical to me.
@EU_Commission And the #plastic pouches for pet food? Tins can be recycled. But they are being pushed out by pet food producers trying to make our owners spend more.
@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen What can we do in the next 5 years?
@EU_Commission Very noble, but it seems too late when micro plastics are being ingested by sea animals at the bottom of the ocean - can’t we aim for sooner?
@EU_Commission @OzarkaNL to the rescue! @plasticpollution
@EU_Commission @GabrielMariya @Ansip_EU @TimmermansEU @DSMeu @NatBruxelles = papers please.
@EU_Commission The people of Iran, freedom want.

@EU_Commission I expect our republic with love, mainly because we will not inside your corruption net. SHAME on you! S XXI Europe with human rights violation x political prisoners, who are you? You are nobody. Visca la REPÚBLICA!
@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen @KarmenuVella @EBienkowskaEU @EU_Growth @EU_ENV @EUClimateAction Finally!Took you a long long time to decide!

@EU_Commission @Europarl_NL will not protect the interests of French fishers lacking competitive power at the cost of innovative and environmentally friendly fishing I hope? #Pulsefishing #pulsvisserij or #Nepotism ?

@EU_Commission Why are supermarket shopping bags, rubbish bags & hygiene products not already recyclable? The technology is available so it's a question of doing it now, not waiting until 2030!! At seaside resorts the sea is full of used higiene products & water bottles, in safe swimming areas!
@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen .
@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen Wow
@EU_Commission EU not Tory  Govt

@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen @KarmenuVella @EBienkowskaEU @EU_Growth @EU_ENV @EUClimateAction Surely the strategy should start with avoid where possible. Some good stuff, but we are still kicking the can (or in this case the plastic carton!) down the road #PlasticsStrategy
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Estonia did a good job. Even MEP were not there. MEP should be paid if they are present for such report.

@EU_Commission bona nit. Sóc una dona catalana que se sent traïda per la seva comissió. L'UE i totes les seves branques governamentals són l'enganyifa més pudent de la història d'Europa. El meu govern i president són l'exemple de tots vostès. Deixin de menystenir a Cat.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU #notmypresident
@EU_Commission @GabrielMariya @Ansip_EU @TimmermansEU @DSMeu @NatBruxelles If you need, We don’t

@EU_Commission @GabrielMariya @Ansip_EU @TimmermansEU @DSMeu @NatBruxelles Welcome to the Soviet Union 2.0. This is the scariest thing I have read on twitter or anywhere. There is no "balance" or compromise or anything when it comes to freedom of expression and a citizens' rights. The EU needs to go. We want to leave autocrats in the last century.
@EU_Commission MOAR TAXES, MORE UNPAID WORK LOAD ON CITIZENS, COMRADE!! @OGiannino
@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen @KarmenuVella @EBienkowskaEU @EU_Growth @EU_ENV @EUClimateAction Stop focusing on a circular economy and STOP the plastic tap!
@EU_Commission @marionprof Too late. Boris Johnson was writing made up stories from Brussels years ago - straight bananas etc etc

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Europe is not defending democracy but business.
M. Juncker has nothing to do with the people of Catalonia, but has built an huge fiscal paradise in Luxembourg (400000hab), country most rich in Europe and that receive most subsidies (per unhabitant) from EU ; Juncker’s democracy.
@EU_Commission, the present federal republic of Fulanis in Nigeria can never accomodate,Biafrans,Oduduwas,Arewa/fulanis, NigerD&Mdle Belts.
@EU_Commission It'll probably take you 10 years to come up with an unworkable plan. Such is the eu.

@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen @EU_ENV @EU_Growth @EUClimateAction Without dismantling the present slave-camp like states in the African continent, migration to Europe will continue to rise with new routes.
@EU_Commission You lot are totally useless. Just ban them NOW. You'd be amazed how quickly industry can change - unlike the eu politicians!
@EU_Commission Quickest way to end or reduce migration of Africans to Europe especially is to dismantle the present neo-slave camps set up in colonial tmes
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Who’s he trying to kid?
@EU_Commission That's brilliant, thank you!! X
@EU_Commission At last...who cares whose idea is was???

@EU_Commission Sure Hitler and Stalin would have said same thing back in their times when combating alternative points of view. What is #Fakenews ? Is #CNN #Fakenews when they have been caught lying time & time again, or is it just the average person who reports on facts you don't want public?

@EU_Commission You can rely on the overpaid, underperforming #EU elites to be behind the curve. It always takes umpteen months for #Brussels gang respond to what has become blatantly obvious and globally known before they start talking,not doing.
Any update on stopping the migrant invasion yet?
@EU_Commission @GabrielMariya @Ansip_EU @TimmermansEU @DSMeu @NatBruxelles This is more scary than 1984! In Europe we should fight for 100% freedom of speech!

@EU_Commission Massive inmigratio of peole with different values and  little commitment to  respect and adapt to the live style and values of countries the arrive will always create social conflict. Economic inmigration empoverih th coutries of origin, the migrants themselves and creates ghetos

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Democratic in the way of the old eastern bloc ? Cause that's what EU is.

Muslims radicalism creates conflict due to their intolerance of others

@EU_Commission @GabrielMariya @DSMeu @Ansip_EU @TimmermansEU @NatBruxelles People should be informed and made aware of the sources, countries and media ready to divulge fake news and misleadingv comments and opinions, based on fake premises. I'd never watch RT or media that's  overtly propagandistic of undemocratic or conflictive countries and regimes
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU This can only be true if you listen to Catalonia people and not try to hide antidemocratic Spanish gov actions

@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen @EBienkowskaEU @KarmenuVella @EU_Growth @EU_ENV @EUClimateAction I hope that even bioplastics are not mentioned, they will be a priority in the Plastics Strategy in order to move to a renewable & low carbon economy. Building up synergies with the future EU #bioeconomy Strategy... @bellser48 @Moedas

@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen @EBienkowskaEU @KarmenuVella @EU_Growth @EU_ENV @EUClimateAction The porooblem with the EU is that it imposes lots of controls and  requirements on local roducts and food production, but few or none on inported ones

@EU_Commission Ships should be controlled and requested to evidence the use of plastics and other soldisby checkng refuse and solid garbage that they should leave on any EU ports for proper disposal. Failure to comply should attract exemplary fines. Fishermen too
@EU_Commission @jyrkikatainen @TimmermansEU Please, stop the central planning, we want the free market EU you have been talking about! Thanks.
@EU_Commission @gmbutts @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen 😴😴😴...

@EU_Commission You are the shame of Europe. You like the police to beat the old ones in Catalonia. You insult democracy when you do not support the legitimate president of Catalonia elected by European citizens of Catalonia.
@EU_Commission @jossbleriot @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen It is all about being responsible for the product's Life Cycle not simply the initial sales! @EU_Commission @UNEP  ...!!!
@EU_Commission Nice to see a real democracy in action! I wish we had one of those. #Brexit #BFPE

@EU_Commission @jyrkikatainen European Shipowners look forward to the revised Port Reception Facilities Directive. We have to prevent illegal discharges of ship-generated waste and cargo residues into the sea, and discharge all waste to shore-side receptacles.

@EU_Commission Plastic is killing our seas, rivers, landscape. Provide those 1,5 Million people and the industry means to change, fast and sustainable. Avoid first, recycle next, and educate everyone. Encourage business to take part!
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU This work belongs to the Bhangyis BUT in Britain the Commoner Saxons/Angles do this work without an itch! Like Peter who washed Jesz' feet.

@EU_Commission Well "€100 million financing the development of smarter and more recyclable plastics materials" should be "more money for eco-friendly plastic replacements"! @EU_H2020 is a multi-billion € framework, we should engage our researchers more in that!
@EU_Commission 👁️🍀👍

@EU_Commission #plasticstrategy launched today. Key points; all plastic #packaging on the EU market will be #recyclable by 2030 | consumption of #singleuse plastics will be reduced. I'll be posting an article outlining what you need to know in the forthcoming weeks.  #environment
@EU_Commission What about deposit fees on plastic bottles? It works so well in Germany. Is this part of the recycling concept?
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU Well I think the Brussels Bosses should be packed in White Bag and for the yellow one, lets pack Jeremy CorbyN!
@EU_Commission Sería interesante y llevar razón paso  creación empleo
@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen Good move for the EU Commission. Keep up the pressure on this front.
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU You're just a trade bloc.
@EU_Commission @satu_helsinki @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen With every drop of water we drink, every breath we take, we're connected to the sea.

@EU_Commission says @EU_ECHA will initiate a restriction process of intentionally added #microplastics within 12 months - if conditions are met after their review of the scientific basis for taking regulatory action at EU level. - We're much looking forward to such a ban!
@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen How do you compare plastics and fishes? By weight, volume ... or what?
@EU_Commission Good plan but 2030 is not fast enough!
@EU_Commission Comon  Su*kers, by 2030, you all will be dealing with recyclable terrorisM!
@EU_Commission Bonne nouvelle: nos services ont déjà constitué votre Ministère de la Vérité.
@EU_Commission we don't need plastic bags #banplasticbags more #biobags
@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen @EU_ENV @EU_Growth @EUClimateAction ..!!
@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen @EU_ENV @EU_Growth @EUClimateAction So you will prohibid credit cards too?😊
@EU_Commission Finally! That’s a great news! 👍🏽 @PlasticOdyssey

@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen "Si no cambiamos la manera en que producimos y usamos plásticos, habrá más plásticos que peces en nuestros océanos para el año 2050", dicen los vicepresidentes @TimmermansEU y @jyrkikatainen durante la presentación de la nueva UE #PlasticsStrategy

@EU_Commission @GabrielMariya @DSMeu @Ansip_EU @TimmermansEU @NatBruxelles And more, outraging & disgusting is that for example so called "reporters of fake news" include "European Values" ThInktank (a cynical joke name for a severe antirussian pro US war site) plus the professional anti russian faker Bellingcat. Why have Europeans to pay for such shit?

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU The EU does not even respect democracy. If they would then they should dismantle the EU as only a minority of people supports the EU. What kind of democracy is based on a ruling minority exactly?

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU I have been reading these 'copy/paste' statements as far as I remember. The reality is heading in the opposite direction. Should we believe our eyes or the political propaganda?

@EU_Commission @GabrielMariya @DSMeu @Ansip_EU @TimmermansEU @NatBruxelles #EU itself is spreading massive desinformation and fake especially to destroy any good historic relationship with Russia and to support US interests in Nazikiev - only have a look to the "desinformation report", they spread the lie of the "meddling into us elections" & a lot more
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU “Democratic”; that’ll be D-Day
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Democratic 😂😂😂😂😂😂😂

@EU_Commission , a veure si d'una vegada sóu demócrates de veritat i feu  q en @KRLS torni a la República de Catalunya sense cap amenaça per part dels fascistes del 155 (ja sabeu qui són) i sigui investit amb normalitat e instauri la voluntat del poble Català.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU What a load of utter crap !
@EU_Commission @GabrielMariya @Ansip_EU @TimmermansEU @DSMeu @NatBruxelles Again again and again : #Fakenews was created when 'journalists' were no longer required to be accurate and complete!

How, exactly?

Why can’t adults decide for themselves?  

Or should we stop having juries and voting because adults can’t be trusted to weigh evidence? 

Je suis Charlie.

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU "More democratic Union...". That will have to include henceforth #Spain  and #Catalonia, dear @EU_Commission. Otherwise, your grand speeches sound hollow and you will end up tying up your international reputation to M. Rajoy's. Beware!
